location: Golf course square airport road Jaiprakash Nagar yerwada Pune Maharashtra
title: The Ritz-Carlton, Pune
description: In a sleek building with a glass exterior, this luxe hotel is a 3-minute walk from the Poona Club golf course, and 4 km each from Pune International Airport and the 19th-century Aga Khan Palace.

location: Senapati Bapat Rd, Laxmi Society, Model Colony, Shivajinagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411053
title: JW Marriott Hotel Pune
description: This luxe hotel is a 13-minute walk from Chaturshringi Temple and 13 km from Aga Khan Palace.Parking is free. The hotel has 5 restaurants, including a rooftop eatery, a deli, and an Italian restaurant serving wood-fired pizzas, along with a night club and a refined bar. There's also a spa, an outdoor pool and a gym, plus a kids' play area, a business centre and 12 event rooms.

title: Conrad, Pune
description: Sleek rooms have refined colour schemes and city views, as well as Wi-Fi access, flat-screen TVs, espresso machines and minibars. Upgraded rooms include sitting areas, while suites offer separate living rooms and wet bars. Some provide access to a lounge with freebies such as breakfast and cocktails. Room service is available. Amenities include 3 stylish restaurants, 2 bars and a coffee shop, plus an outdoor pool, a 24/7 gym, a chic spa, 13 meeting rooms and 12,000 sq ft. of total event space.

location: Weikfield IT Citi Info Park, Nagar Rd, Sakore Nagar, Viman Nagar, Pune, Maharashtra 411014
title: Hyatt Regency Pune & Residences
description: The 222 stylish, modern rooms feature flat-screen TVs, plus Wi-Fi, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites have balconies with city views, as well as sitting areas, dining tables and access to a private lounge. The 79 serviced apartments add kitchens. There's 24-hour room service. There's a chic international food hall, an all-day bistro, a warm cafe/bar, and a lively cocktail lounge serving Chinese dishes. Other amenities include an indoor pool, a spa and a gym. Parking is available.
